title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: The All types dialog in JDK 1.4 is displaying obfuscated classes such as a, a1, b, c, d, etc.
OB: When opening the All types dialog in JDK 1.4, it shows obfuscated classes.
EB: The All types dialog should not display obfuscated classes.
SR:
To fix this issue, there are two possible solutions:

a) Sort lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter.

b) Filter out obfuscated classes completely.

I recommend implementing solution a).
